creator: jfclere@gmail.com
text:
If you look to the index.html of /tomcat-connectors-1.2.37-src/docs/ you get:
14 May 2012 - JK-1.2.36 released
Which is the previous release we should have the current release there may be without a date and released.

I added a note to HOWTO-RELEASE.txt in r1583417.
It's up to the release manager how to handle that.
creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
